title: VIOO Makes Bullish Cross Above Critical Moving Average - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Thursday, shares of the Vanguard S&P Small-Cap 600 ETF (Symbol: VIOO) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $139.48, changing hands as high as $141.25 per share. Vanguard S&P Small-Cap 600 shares are currently trading up about 2.7% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of VIOO shares, versus its 200 day moving average:
